alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Claiborne, Hawkins, Hancock, north central Cocke, central Greene, northeastern Grainger, eastern Hamblen and Lee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Cubage to 6 miles east of White Pine. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Rogersville, Sneedville, Jonesville, Bean Station, Surgoinsville, Pennington Gap, Russellville, Mosheim and Bulls Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
